oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ al-Mulakhkhaṣ fī al-hayʻah : manuscript, 1854
Sharḥ-i Chaghmīnī
Sharḥ al-Mulakhkhaṣ fī al-hayʻah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Qāḍīʹzādah, Mūsá ibn Muḥammad , -approximately 1436
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, from 13 to 15 lines per page, in red and black.

According to the colophon (f. 80r), copy completed in Rabiʻ al-Thānī 1270 AH [1854 AD] or [1]127 [1715]. It seems that missing folios at the end (ff. 78-80) were copied from another copy at this date, and not the whole book.
Given as gift by Sanawīʻzādah (?) to his nephew (ibn akh) Maḥmūd Nadīm. Seal under the gift statement reads "ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ, 1292 AH [1875 or 6 AD]".
Marginal and interlinear notes from various ḥāshiyahs.
MS Arab SM221. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
